title: Musketeer

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, you may select a target for each ability. You can pick different targets if you wish:
 - Sabre: Guard a target. Roleblock and Wound each of their Unwounded visitors. 1 night cooldown. RB/Control immune while using.
 - Musket: Astrally fire at a target. They are Wounded. 4 uses

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you kill a townie, you put away your musket out of guilt - although you keep your sabre.
- If you would give a Wounded player another Wound, you instead deal a powerful attack to them.
- Wounds are removed when the player is healed.
- Neither you nor your targets learn if they are Wounded.
- *__Made for the Curated role list__*

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Hang those who oppose the town.

desc:
Post 5181
*"Sword and rifle - what better couple for the refined soldier?"*
